LanguageData.RWBY_TimeDilation.label: 時間延遲
LanguageData.RWBY_TimeDilation.description: Time dilation slows time in the area of the glyph and slows all movement.
LanguageData.RWBY_AuraStolen.label: aura被盜
LanguageData.RWBY_AuraStolen.description: 被盜的aura永遠無法自行恢復。
LanguageData.RWBY_ApathyTiredness.label: 削弱意志
LanguageData.RWBY_ApathyTiredness.description: 殖民者正在慢慢失去自己的意志力。

LanguageData.RWBY_ApathyTiredness.stages.1.label: 悶

LanguageData.RWBY_ApathyTiredness.stages.5.label: 困倦

LanguageData.RWBY_ApathyTiredness.stages.9.label: 僵死
